post.body: hanging at St. Dymphna's - st. marks btw 1st ave and A, swing by ill be here till 9
enjoying last night of being 36
getting ready to see a prospective client
writing up meeting notes from meeting of BIW team to discuss BIW 2.0
watching this http://tinyurl.com/5vfpkn
thinking about 3-d printers, wishing i had an extra 20 grand laying around
writing show notes for BIW eipisode 37
just found jasonpine now following
just posted Brooklyn is Watching episode 22- a good one! www.brooklyniswatching.com
Getting ready to record Biw 22
Finally! BIW podcast 20 is up http://tinyurl.com/57grxj this one is odd&interesting- v. meta
Getting ready to record Biw podcast #20
Brooklyn is Watching podcast#19 is now up! its excellent! with art critic James Kalm, artist Patrick Lichty and SL art maven Bettina Tizzy
BIW podcast 15 is released... this is the one with jay talking to himself... spooky!
getting podcast 15 ready-- it will be the strangest one yet
reading surge of new posts on brooklyniswatching.com
getting ready for lucky podcast #13
BIW's blog got 16,900 page views in May, and podcasts are getting many hundreds of downloads.
iTunes Review anyone?http://tinyurl.com/6zabmy
Party 2ight at Jack the Pelican 7-9 edt 4-6 SLT http://www.artcal.net/event/view/2/7269 come 2 Brooklyn is Watching and mess with NOOBS!
getting ready to grade student's websites
finally made it to seattle, found luggage, with family, yay!
MSP..... i was still in MSP
getting ready to go to the airport
putting more finishing touches on a client's animation
Good conversation going at http://tinyurl.com/4gqmut, I'm looking up something called "Abigail's Party".
just posted BIW podcast 39 -- this is a speed record for recording to posting yay!
